title: The year journalists abandon the press conference
description: 2026 will be the year when journalists finally realize that being in the room is not where news happens. Sure, à la Hamilton the musical, lots of back-room deals happen in quiet, private spaces of power — but journalists generally aren’t in those rooms. Instead, journalists go to press conferences and public meetings — and...
